presentationTable.name: Measures
presentationTable.description: Basic nQuire Usage Metrics that use SUM, MAX, AVG COUNT aggregration rules.

presentationColumns.name: # of Queries
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:10 - Usage Tracking.UT L Query Facts.# of Queries
presentationColumns.description: A count of all queries executed against the nQuire Server.  Count is the aggregration rule for this calc

presentationColumns.name: Max Total Time in Secs
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:10 - Usage Tracking.UT L Query Facts.Max Total Time in Secs
presentationColumns.description: Maximum amount of time (total) for a request.  MAX is the aggregration rule for this calculation.

presentationColumns.name: Avg Total Time In Secs
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:10 - Usage Tracking.UT L Query Facts.Avg Total Time In Secs
presentationColumns.description: Average amount of time (total time) for a request.  AVG is the aggregration rule for this calculation.

presentationColumns.name: Total Time in Secs
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:10 - Usage Tracking.UT L Query Facts.Total Time in Secs
presentationColumns.description: Total amount of time for a request. SUM is the aggregration rule for this calculation.

presentationColumns.name: Max Row Count
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:10 - Usage Tracking.UT L Query Facts.Max Row Count
presentationColumns.description: Maximum number of rows returned for a request.  MAX is the aggregration rule for this calculation.

presentationColumns.name: Avg Row Count
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:10 - Usage Tracking.UT L Query Facts.Avg Row Count
presentationColumns.description: Average number of rows returned for a request.  AVG is the aggregration rule for this calculation.

presentationColumns.name: Max Compile Time in Secs
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:10 - Usage Tracking.UT L Query Facts.Max Compile Time in Secs
presentationColumns.description: Maximum amount of time in seconds for a request to be complied on the nQuire Server.  MAX is the aggregration rule for this calculation.

presentationColumns.name: Avg Compile Time In Secs
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:10 - Usage Tracking.UT L Query Facts.Avg Compile Time In Secs
presentationColumns.description: Average amount of time in seconds for a request to be complied on the nQuire Server.  AVG is the aggregration rule for this calculation.

presentationColumns.name: Max Time Spent in dB
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:10 - Usage Tracking.UT L Query Facts.Max Time Spent in dB
presentationColumns.description: Maximum amount of time spent in the DataSource (Database) for a request.  MAX is the aggregration rule for this calculation.

presentationColumns.name: Avg Time Spent in dB
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:10 - Usage Tracking.UT L Query Facts.Avg Time Spent in dB
presentationColumns.description: AVG amount of time spent in the DataSource (Database) for a request.  AVG is the aggregration rule for this calculation.

presentationColumns.name: Total Time Spent in dB
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:10 - Usage Tracking.UT L Query Facts.Total Time Spent in dB
presentationColumns.description: Total amount of time spent in the DataSource (Database) for a request.  SUM is the aggregration rule for this calculation.

presentationColumns.name: Total Num dB Queries
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:10 - Usage Tracking.UT L Query Facts.Total Num dB Queries
presentationColumns.description: Total Number of Queries executed on the nQuire server.  SUM is the aggregration rulee for this calculation.

presentationColumns.name: Avg Num dB Queries
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:10 - Usage Tracking.UT L Query Facts.Avg Num dB Queries
presentationColumns.description: Average Number of Queries executed on the nQuire server.  AVG is the aggregration rulee for this calculation.

presentationColumns.name: Number of cache entries inserted
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:10 - Usage Tracking.UT L Query Facts.Number of cache entries inserted

presentationColumns.name: Number of cache hits
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:10 - Usage Tracking.UT L Query Facts.Number of cache hits

presentationColumns.name: Dashboard Count
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:10 - Usage Tracking.UT L Query Facts.Dashboard Count

presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:10 - Usage Tracking.UT L Query Facts.Dashboard Page Count

presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:10 - Usage Tracking.UT L Query Facts.Report Count

presentationColumns.name: # of Queries Hitting Cache
